| History                 = Cortex Inc. is an enterprise which in less than two years went from an unknown start-up to a giant in their industry. They secretly created products which infected the public consciousness in order to slowly control society.

When the powerful material [[Phlogistone]] was discovered on the [[Luna (Moon)|Moon]], Cortex tasked [[Colin Sixty (Earth-616)|C. Anderson Sixty]] with establishling a headquarters in the human lunar colony of [[Tranquility Gulch]].{{r|Iron Man: Fatal Frontier Infinite Comic Vol 1 4}} At the product launch of a Cortex's phlogistone-powered glasses, [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] created a distraction in order to access to their network. He then forced the company to permanently halt production of the glasses.{{r|Iron Man: Fatal Frontier Infinite Comic Vol 1 5|7}}

Stark later revealed Anderson Sixty's alliance with [[Advanced Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]] to the press in order to turn public perception against Cortex. With his life ruined, Sixty tried to kill Stark with a laser cutter. However, Stark was able to disarm Sixty by submerging his hand in a tank of liquid nitrogen, thereby maiming him.{{r|Iron Man: Fatal Frontier Infinite Comic Vol 1 11}}

Cortex's CEO, [[Jason Quantrell (Earth-616)|Jason Quantrell]], was later possessed by the [[Beyond Corporation (Multiverse)|Beyond Corporation]], who used the company as a front to further their own agenda against humanity.{{r|Captain America and the Mighty Avengers Vol 1 5}}
